subject: Murders and Attempted Murders
Boxing
lead_paragraph: Arturo Gatti’s wife will remain in jail pending a judicial decision despite the release of an initial autopsy report that said Gatti could have died in an unexplained accident, been murdered or committed suicide.
snippet: Arturo Gatti’s wife will remain in jail pending a judicial decision despite the release of an initial autopsy report that said Gatti could have died in an unexplained accident, been murdered or committed suicide.
